('player_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : _isWardog && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isCommander && isReady ? ('commander_' + _formationType + postfix) : isCommander && !isReady ? ('commander_not_ready_' +_formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : 'empty_slot_division'

bind.name: instance
watch
bind.value: 'isVisible'; (field == 'IDS_RANKED_BATTLES' && (feature_16 == 'locked' || rankedBattlesSeason.denyReason & RBDeny.NO_SEASON)) ? false : (field == 'IDS_CLUB_BATTLES' && (feature_19 == 'locked' || clubBattlesSeasonId <= 0 || clubBattlesSeasonStage != 2)) ? false : ((field == 'IDS_WITH_COMMANDER' || field == 'IDS_WITHOUT_COMMANDER') && feature_13 == 'locked') ? false : true

'training_room': selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.RANKED_BATTLE ? (rankedBattlesSeason.isJuniorSeason == true) ? 'rank_junior' : 'rank' : selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.EVENT_BATTLE ? 'event' : selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.CLAN_BATTLE ? 'club' : 'no_icon'

bind.name: watch

'IDS_CUSTOM_ROOM' : selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.RANKED_BATTLE ? 'IDS_RANKED_BATTLES' : selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.CLAN_BATTLE ? 'IDS_CLANBATTLE' : selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.EVENT_BATTLE ? 'IDS_EVENTBATTLE' : 'UNKNOWN_BATTLE_TYPE'
